scripts.buildMain: cd main-app && npm run build && cp-cli ../main-app/dist ../static/main-dist
scripts.buildVue: cd micro-vue && npm run build && cp-cli ../micro-vue/dist ../static/vue-dist
scripts.buildReact: cd micro-react && npm run build && cp-cli ../micro-react/build ../static/react-dist
scripts.buildAll: npm run buildMain && npm run buildVue && npm run buildReact
